Activity: Log in to the OA system, check emails. Review the final prototypes and prepare for the team review.

Present the final interactive prototypes to the entire team (@prod-1, @ldes-1, @sdes-1, @sdes-2, @cdev-1, @cdev-2, @cdev-3, @qtest-1, @3dmod-1, @3dmod-2, @tart-1, @tdev-1, @aud-1, @sdev-1, @lvdn-1, @ndes-1, @cart-1, @beng-1, @lpro-1). Gather final feedback.
Take a short break, reflect on the week's progress and feedback received.
Incorporate any final feedback from the team review into the prototypes, ensuring all stakeholders are satisfied.
Export the final prototypes and share them with the development team (@cdev-1, @cdev-2, @cdev-3) for implementation.
Document the design process, including iterations and feedback, for future reference.
Plan for next week's tasks, considering any upcoming design challenges or new features.
Wrap up the week by organizing files and sending a summary email to @prod-1 with the week's accomplishments and next steps.
